content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":24087,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e1f473e-8b9d-439c-b4f6-8cda06cdb537/QE_onboarding_10.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e1f473e-8b9d-439c-b4f6-8cda06cdb537/QE_onboarding_10.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_10.png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_10.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7e1f473e-8b9d-439c-b4f6-8cda06cdb537\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":522,\"height\":153},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The discipline started to develop in 2012 as a stage in the evolution of manual testing. Test Automation is used mainly on long-term projects, because it reduces testing time and allows you to work with large volumes. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#498205\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To grow in test automation, you will need to learn at least one of the programming languages: Java, JS, Python and others. You can also study frameworks such as Vividus, Tricentis Tosca, etc. that do not require learning programming languages (so-called codeless automation) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In our fast-paced environment, customers want to have daily releases, and therefore\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\",\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#D13438\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" cannot do without automation. Especially on Enterprise projects (for large companies and corporations). On such projects, functional testers do only some testing and write new documentation, while the rest of the processes are automated. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Engineers of all levels have an opportunity to switch to automation. There are\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCTSTAP/Test+Automation+Mentoring+Programs\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"mentoring programs\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"color\":\"#0563C1\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"that will help you to do your first steps as a test automation engineer.  \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For the first acquaintance with automation, manual testers can also master codeless frameworks. The simplest is Record play. More complicated: Vividus, AWN, Tricentis Tosca, JDI and others. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can learn more\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-themecolor\":\"text1\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"about the Test Automation Department from the knowledge base\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCTSTAP/EPAM+Test+Automation+Practice+Home\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"page\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"color\":\"#0563C1\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Accelerators that we use to speedup delivery - \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/ETSTCC/Accelerators\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For questions about Test Automation, feel free to contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Ihar_Bylitski\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ihar Bylitski\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
